Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.attributes

Class BaseAttribute

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.attributes.BaseAttribute
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fasting, GrowthSpurt, HalfAHeart, HoneyIShrunkTheKids, ZeroGravity
public abstract class BaseAttribute extends BaseEvent
Abstract base class for managing player attribute modifications in the EventHorizon plugin. This class provides functionality to apply and remove attribute modifiers to players, track modified players, and manage attribute modification events.

  • Field Details

    • random

      protected final Random random
      Random number generator for attribute-related calculations

    • key

      protected final org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key
      Unique identifier for this attribute event

    • attributeModifiers

      protected Map<org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute,List<org.bukkit.attribute.AttributeModifier>> attributeModifiers
      Maps Bukkit Attributes to their corresponding AttributeModifiers. Each Attribute can have multiple modifiers applied to it.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseAttribute

      public BaseAttribute(EventClassification classification, String eventName)
      Constructs a new BaseAttribute with the specified classification and event name.
      Parameters:
      classification - The event classification (POSITIVE, NEUTRAL, or NEGATIVE)
      eventName - The unique name for this attribute event
